#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int i,s[n];
		double p[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>s[i];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>p[i];
		double temp,ans=0.0;
		for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			temp=(s[i]*p[i])+(1-p[i])*ans;
			if(temp>ans)
				ans=temp;
		}
		printf("%.6lf\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
